thread.title: Smita Chandra Thomas
thread.title_full: HireAHelper reviewed by Smita Chandra Thomas

author: Smita Chandra Thomas
title: Smita Chandra Thomas
text: Overall good experience. The crew turned up late, which wasn't great and they didn't come prepared with the moving blankets we had requested. But once they got moving, the foreman knew exactly what he was doing. They moved some complicated gym equipment without damaging any walls and did a great job taking it apart and putting it back together.
